name: Clock Out At 2
storyline:
Work-life balance doesn't exist for those deemed lesser. Survive the work day and maintain your mental health or face being sent to HR.

You are Celia, an afro-latina woman trying to survive another day at work. You need to clock out early but the company culture won't allow it.

To make matters worse, ever since the “incident”, you’ve been seeing strange and terrifying creatures.

Is it real? Or is the stress getting to you?
summary: Clock Out at 2 is a roguelite visual novel in which you have to survive inside the corporate machine known as the "workplace". Eat fast food. Drink lots of espressos. Experience microaggressions. Pray they don't fire you.
